attributes.action: Consider international students graduating In 2020 for the PSW visa of 2 years.
attributes.additional_details: We were not able to utilise the opportunities that the government set out for us in terms of career. Due to economic downfall and lockdown in recent weeks several companies have delayed recruitment. This impacts us, severely as it reduced the limited time and opportunity we had for a job or an internships. We invested a lot in our course and living expenses and we expected a good outcome out of it which was not the case due to COVID-19 and we would like to have it back in the form of PSW visa.
attributes.background: For the students graduating in the year 2020, have limited exposure in terms of job opportunities and internships after their studies due to the global pandemic COVID-19. I urge the authorities to consider the students graduating in 2020 for the Post Study Work visa of 2 years.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304442
